item.name: Consulta de Transações por Código de Transação

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Strict-Transport-Security
header.description: A HSTS Policy informing the HTTP client how long to cache the HTTPS only policy and whether this applies to subdomains.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

item.name: Consulta de Transações histórico de transações

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" standalone="yes"?>
<preApprovalRequest>
<preApproval>
<name>Plano - 1sdofiusdf089290818432uioijjifd09230938904</name> //Nome do plano
  <reference>PATYREF</reference>
<charge>AUTO</charge>
<!--<charge>MANUAL</charge>-->
<period>YEARLY</period>
<!--<period>MONTHLY</period>
<maxAmountPerPeriod>90000.00</maxAmountPerPeriod>
-->
<amountPerPayment>200.00</amountPerPayment> //Valor máximo cobrado por período
<cancelURL>http://sitedocliente.com</cancelURL> //URL de cancelamento
<membershipFee>150.00</membershipFee> //Taxa de adesão
<trialPeriodDuration>28</trialPeriodDuration> //Tempo de teste
 </preApproval>
 <maxUses>500</maxUses> //Quantidade máxima de uso do plano
 </preApprovalRequest>
 <!--
 <preApprovalRequest> 
<reference>Plano Padrao</reference> 
<preApproval> 
<name>Plano para todos os clientes</name> 
<charge>MANUAL</charge> 
<period>MONTHLY</period> 
</preApproval> 
</preApprovalRequest>
-->

body.raw:
<payment>
	<items>
		<item>
			<id>0001</id>
			<description>SeCliente tem razão a</description>
			<amount>1000.00</amount>
			<quantity>1</quantity>
		</item>
		<item>
			<id>0002</id>
			<description>Cubo 2</description>
			<amount>1000.00</amount>
			<quantity>9</quantity>
		</item>
		<item>
			<id>0003</id>
			<description>Suporte de Cubo 2</description>
			<amount>1000.00</amount>
			<quantity>1</quantity>
		</item>
		<item>
			<id>0004</id>
			<description>Suporte de Cubo 2</description>
			<amount>9900.00</amount>
			<quantity>99</quantity>
		</item>
	</items>
	<reference>REF1234-1</reference>
	<preApprovalCode>{{directPreApprovalCode}}</preApprovalCode>
</payment>

exec: tests["This checkout code should be valid"] = jsonObject.checkout.code.length == 32

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
header.description: Used in response to a preflight request to indicate which HTTP headers can be used when making the actual request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
header.description: Specifies the method or methods allowed when accessing the resource. This is used in response to a preflight request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
header.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Expires
header.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.
